T=int(raw_input())

for _ in range(0,T):
    N=int(raw_input())
    A=list(map(int,raw_input().split()))
    D=list(map(int,raw_input().split()))
    
    start=min(A)
    end=max(D)
    count=0
    max_count=0
    for i in range(start,end):
        count=0
        for j in range(0,N):
            if((i>=A[j]) and (i<D[j])):
                count+=1
        if(count>max_count):
            max_count=count
            
    print max_count
